text: Oh, God.
It's locked!
Sally! Sally!
It won't open!
Sally, please, I can't do this!
Sally, hurry up!
Where are you?

Larry! They've blocked off
the back door, but there's a cellar!

There might be a way out,
delivery hatch or something.
I'm coming! I can't stay here!
Okay, boys, I know how this works.
You can't move so long as I can see you.
Whole world in the box, the Doctor says.

Hope he's not lying, 'cause I don't see
how else we're getting out.
Oh and there's your one.
Why's it pointing at the...
light?
Oh, my God! It's turning out the lights!

-Quickly!
-I can't find the lock!
Sally, hurry up!
Go faster!
They're getting closer, Sally! Come on!
It won't turn!
Sally!
This is security protocol 712.

This time capsule has detected
the presence

of an authorised control disc,
valid one journey.

Please insert the disc
and prepare for departure.
Looks like a DVD player. There's a slot.

-They're trying to get in!
-Well, hurry up, then!
What's happening?
Oh, my God! It's leaving us behind!
Doctor, no, you can't!
Doctor!
Look at them! Quick, look at them!
I don't think we need to.
He tricked them. The Doctor tricked them.

They're looking at each other.
They're never going to move again.
